Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-47279 affecting package nodejs18 for versions less than 18.20.3-6
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-47279 affecting package nodejs18 for versions less than 18.20.3-6. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package nodejs18 is earlier than 18.20.3-6, affected by CVE-2025-47279
